add-following-url-to-google-cloud-app-re: Please add the following URL in your Google Cloud APP Authorized redirect URI:
blocks-search-engines-from-indexing-and-: Blocks search engine indexing and link following
allow-user-registration-from-website: Allow users to register from the website.
force-https-for-all-pages: Force secure HTTPS connection for all the pages.
invalid-script-break-website: Any invalid script syntax can break the website. Please be cautious.
sitemap-url-in-each-line: Write each URL in a new line that you want to exclude from the sitemap.
domain-is-required-for-smtp-config: A domain is required by some hosting providers for SMTP configuration.
2fa-login-attempt-code-1: On each login attempt, you will receive a code on
2fa-login-attempt-code-2: On successful verification you will be able to login.
2fa-notification-description: We have sent you a code in your email, please verify to continue.
